info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:24PM EDT until April 01 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA AND NORTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND COUNTIES... At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Belsano, or 9 miles west of Nanty-Glo, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Homer City, Black Lick, New Florence, Seward, Bolivar, Vintondale, Armagh, Lucerne Mines, Brush Vly, and Yellow Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
